alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 16 at 3:36PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CHST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...West Central Guam. * WHEN...Until 530 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 332 PM ChST, gauge reports indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Yona, Talofofo, Asan, Piti, Agat and Santa Rita. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
